Name meaning
Refers to the permanent arc-shaped parts of engineering buildings such as bridges and culverts
xuàn
Ixuàn
桥梁、 涵洞等工程建筑中永久性拱形支架 arch
IIxuàn
用砖、 石等砌拱 build arch by laying bricks or stones。 如: 碹涵洞; 碹拱; 碹窑
